heroSubtitle: Old Town Placerville favorites — hearty plates, friendly booths, and pie that never misses.
about: A Placerville staple since 1985. We cook the classics from scratch, fill the room with antiques and stories, and keep the coffee hot all day.
specials: Ask about today’s pie flavors • Hangtown Fry • Chicken Fried Steak

categoryIntros.Skillets, Scrambles & Omelets: Breakfast classics with hearty sides & scratch biscuits.
categoryIntros.Country Comfort Dinners: Dinner entrees made like grandma used to.
categoryIntros.Desserts & Bakery: Pies, sundaes, and from-scratch sweets you won’t forget.
